verbs.description: philadelphia appoints 23 members of new commission on lgbt affairs the 23 members of the new philadelphia commission on lgbt affairs who [V: will] have input on city policies to support the lives of lgbt individuals in the city and support and amplify the work of the office of lgbt affairs lgbt commission office of diversity inclusion philadelphia mayoral commission mayors commission philadelphia mayor jim kenney office of lgbt affairs lgbt
